import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

About Me

Hi, I'm John Doe, a web developer with 5+ years of experience in front-end development. I have a passion for creating beautiful, responsive websites that provide a great user experience.

My skills include:

  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
  • Bootstrap
  • Angular
  • React
